lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau plws pqR nwgbyl myl Bey phucq kir nrpq jg jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Palaas Patr Naagabayl Mayl Bhaay , Pahouchat Kari Narapat Jag Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a meritless leaf of Butea frondosa when enjoins a betel leaf can reach the hands of the king and this is known the world over.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau kucIl nIl brn brnu ibKY hIr cIr sMig inrdoK aunmwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Koucheel Neel Baran Baranu Bikhai , Heer Cheer Sangi Niradokh Ounamaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as blue colour is regarded dirty amongst all the colours, but a dress of that colour when enjoins a diamond is considered flawless and unadulterated.

lines.gurmukhi: swlgRwm syvw smY mhw ApivqR sMK prm pivqR jg Bog ibKY AwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Saalagraam Sayvaa Samai Mahaa Apavitr Sankha , Param Pavitr Jag Bhog Bikhai Aaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a conch is high by impious, being the skeleton of a sea worm, but its sounding at the time of worship of idols, distribution of consecrated offerings and holding of yoga is considered supreme and sacred.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy mm kwg swDsMgiq mrwl mwl mwr n auTwvq gwvq gurbwnIAY ]501]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Mam Kaag Saadhasangati Maraal Maala , Maar N Outthaavat Gaavat Gurbaaneeai ?501?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, a congregation of saintly persons in the presence of True Guru is an assembly of swans where I, person of crow- like temperament indulging in singing of Gurbani not turned out and away.  (501)
